General.Name: EstechPharma Co. Ltd
General.Description: EstechPharma Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pharmaceuticals products. It also offers raw materials, such as RBM and PLK. The company was formerly known as Estech Chemical and changed its name to EstechPharma Co., Ltd. in January 2001. EstechPharma Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
